chapters.title: Chapter 42: Before the Stone of Tear
chapters.info: High Lord Hearne, p. 662—One of the High Lords of Tear. When the battle in Cairhien was over, he and a few other High Lords took to hiding in Haddon Mirk—they were traitors to the Dragon Reborn. He returned to Tear, but he worried that he would be trapped there when the other High Lords returned from Illian. He is still in Tear now, and supports Rand.
